meanings: (물체와 물체의) connection, link, connect, link, join, attach

vlive.korean: 연결... Connection is un... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SKZ in the building!!!!!!
지금 연결이 잘 되고 있어요? Is connection good? 듣기 View video TWICE : 아레나 투어 마지막 공연🎶👀
TV랑 연결했다고요? You are watching this on TV right now? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: You are watching this on TV right now?

vlive.korean: TV랑 연결을 하셨다고! This person says he/she is watching this on TV! 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: This person says he/she is watching this on TV!

vlive.korean: 그 TV 연결 안 하시면 안 돼요? Can you disconnect your phone from the TV? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Can you disconnect your phone from the TV?

examples.korean: A chain of volcanoes girdles the Pacific. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사슬처럼 연결된 화산이 태평양을 둘러싸고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A chain of volcanoes girdles the Pacific. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We harnessed two ponies to the cart. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 조랑말 두 마리에 마구를 채워 작은 마차에 연결했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We harnessed two ponies to the cart. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: First, disconnect the boiler from the water mains. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 먼저 주 송수관에서 보일러 연결 부위를 끊어라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: First, disconnect the boiler from the water mains. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t overuse a causal connective like ‘because’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook because와 같은 인과관계 연결사를 남용하지 말아라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t overuse a causal connective like ‘because’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I replaced the taps and reconnected the water supply. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 수도꼭지를 교체하고 상수도를 다시 연결했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I replaced the taps and reconnected the water supply. Add to Wordbook
